name: Operation Teleblade
description:
Entry for the GMC Jam 48. The theme was Bugs and Glitches.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left mouse button - Throw sword

Story:

Trapped in the basement cell of a highly secure facility, you happen upon a sword with some very strange effect. It violently pulls its user towards its last thrown location.

Time to stick it to your captors, mind the robot gaurds though.

Credits:

Mavvy - Everything not listed below. (Barring testing, I tested it I swear!)
Freesound - CC0 sound effects that I compiled into the game's soundscape.
Matt K - Testing
Evan P - Testing

Notes:

I hope you like 90s drum n bass.

Thanks for playing! :)
